code: import{createSelector}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export var getContacts=function getContacts(state){return state.contacts.items;};export var getFilterContacts=function getFilterContacts(state){return state.contacts.filter;};export var getVisibleContacts=createSelector([getContacts,getFilterContacts],function(items,filter){return items.filter(function(_ref){var name=_ref.name;return name.toLowerCase().includes(filter.toLowerCase());});});
